title: idek
body: im just playing on my friend account for fun. im just leveling her up and wont rank her up. would that like count as boosting, becasue i dont want her account to be banned or anything for boosting.

replies.body: We don't support account sharing, and using her account puts her at risk at further compromise and getting it banned.  Queue with your friend, but stay out of their account.  Stay safe!
me and her no each other irl. so its fine but im just asking because i wouldnt want her to get reported

Not a matter of reported and regardless of knowing them in rl.  If you want to be a good friend, stay off their account.  You risk their account, are compromising it, and we have systems that will tackle behavior like this.  Not trying to come off stern, but trying to pass on the seriousness to you.  ^^
also this isnt the account and she doesn't usually have time to level up her account because of school.
